tweet: Any entry at this point wouldn't be bad at all for long term investing.  Provided the project is legit & not a shitcoin.  I can help you out with some choices:  $TOMO $QNT $NKN $CHX $UBT $LTO $AERGO $VET $ICX $ZIL $WAVES $LINK  There are more but over diversification isn't good.
